Let your hob take care of the hood

Let your hob take care of the hood The 700 Hob2Hood¬Æ automatically controls the hood settings. As you cook, the fan adjusts according to the temperature changes you make or if you start to use more than one zone. So you can focus more on creating delicious dishes.

Hob2Hood¬Æ for pure convenience

Hob2Hood¬Æ for pure convenience The Hob2Hood¬Æ function wirelessly connects your hob to your hood. Start cooking and the hood will automatically adjust the settings, providing the best extraction based on the power selected on the hob. It does the hard work so you can keep your mind ‚Äì and your hands ‚Äì on your cooking.

Keep kitchen air clean with this powerful Hood Motor

Keep kitchen air clean with this powerful Hood Motor This powerful, advanced Hood Motor ensures that your kitchen remains free from unwanted fumes and cooking smells. It clears the air quickly and efficiently.

Long life and great lighting ‚Äì let LEDlights lead the way

Long life and great lighting ‚Äì let LEDlights lead the way Enjoy expert illumination while you cook. Our LEDlights use far less energy than other lights and provide excellent visibility in the kitchen, ensuring you cook with greater confidence and agility.

Standard grease filter for a clean kitchen

Standard grease filter for a clean kitchen Our reliable grease filter means you can always enjoy a clear cooking space. When a new filter is required, it can be easily washed or replaced. Your kitchen will be cleaner for longer.
